mdRecord.dcterms:description: ALDERMAN DEAN'S OFFICE: X031813049 Bookplate of Thomas Jenkins Craven on inside front cover. Inscription on front fly-leaf. UVA Author: Edwin Anderson Alderman.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LB875.C82 1911 COPY 1: Gift of Mrs. E.A. Alderman; bookplate of Edwin Anderson Alderman. LB875.C82 1911 COPY 2: Gift of Philip Alexander Bruce; inscribed by the author to Bruce August 28, 1911; bookplate of Philip Alexander Bruce; armorial bookplate of Archibald Bolling Shepperson.
Item X002650235 has bookplate data: Mr. Alfred W. Erickson.
